title: Curated tuberculosis analysis learning kit
text: CuratedTBData R data package accessible via Bioconductor GitHub. program facilitates integrative studies across TB gene expression datasets improving reliability replicability signature construction validation. research purposes, standardized gene expression measurements clinical annotations currently provided curated TBData. MultiassayExperiment objects, effectively manage raw data, several normalized versions data, metadata, certain intermediate analysis findings, data maintained R. reprocessed 49 datasets created standardized workflows data preprocessing annotation. addition, curatedTBData offers capabilities subsetting aggregating transcriptome datasets currently available tools, like ComBat ComBat-Seq. order showcase usefulness curatedTBData, carried organized analysis verification several published TB gene signatures derived blood. investigate prediction power TB gene signatures relation distinguishing PTB LTBI healthy individuals (Control) 49 carefully selected studies. train assess gene signature ensembles, also leverage dataset datatype aggregation methods integrated curatedTBData based prior research. Moreover, demonstrate use ensemble learning approach combines predictive power several gene signatures.

title: Curated tuberculosis analysis learning kit
text: Install BiocManager related packages
code: if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install("DESeq2", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("GenomicRanges", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("MultiAssayExperiment", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("SummarizedExperiment", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("TBSignatureProfiler", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("curatedTBData", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("scran", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE) BiocManager::install("SEtools", update = TRUE, ask = FALSE)

title: Runs the TBSignatureProfiler using selected datasets, profiles, and assays — runTBsigProfilerFunction
code: runTBsigProfilerFunction(   selected_dataset,   selected_profiles,   selected_assay,   selected_algorithm,   selected_signatures,   selected_colData )

title: Runs the TBSignatureProfiler using selected datasets, profiles, and assays — runTBsigProfilerFunction
text: selected_dataset selected dataset (summarized experiment object) viewed. Required. selected_profiles group selected profiles (Anderson_42/Berry_393/etc) viewed. Allows select profiles appear within dt output. Required. selected_assay assay used profiler (counts, log counts, etc). Required. selected_algorithm algorithm (GSVA/ssGSEA) used tbSigProfiler. Required selected_signatures signatures available profiler run . Necessary, updates TBsignatures occur within app. Required. selected_colData Selects specific info viewed data table output. example: Age, TBStatus, Gender. Required.

title: Runs the TBSignatureProfiler using selected datasets, profiles, and assays — runTBsigProfilerFunction
